"Shuowen": "Gradually, the water will flow out of the middle of Danyang Yinanman and enter the sea in the east. From the water, the sound will be cut." "Shui Jing. Volume 40": "Gradually, the river flows out of the capital of the emperor, passing Yuhang to the north, and entering the sea in the east."

" Gradually " means to flow in slowly. Such as "Shang Shu. "Yugong": "Eastern by the sea, west by the quicksand." It also means dredging. Such as "Historical Records. "Yuewang Jujian Family": "Yu's contribution is great, gradually Jiuchuan, and Jiuzhou, as for today's summer Ai'an."

" Gradually " means wetting. Such as "Poetry. Wei Feng. "Mang": "Qi Shui Tang Tang, gradually changing clothes." "Mo Zi. Shang Xian Xia: "The rain and dew are gradually growing, and the grains are nurturing." Sun Yirang Xianxian quoted "Guang Ya": "Gradually, stains."

" Gradually " also refers to dip. Such as "Xunzi. "Encourage Learning": "The root of Lanhuai is Zhizhi, and it gradually becomes wet. The gentleman does not get close, and the common people refuse to accept it." "Han Shu. "The Biography of Dong Zhongshu": "Gradually the people are based on benevolence, the people are based on friendship, and the people are based on etiquette. Therefore, the punishment is very light and those who do not commit crimes are forbidden. The customs and customs are also beautiful."

" Gradually " means gradual and progressive. Such as "Xunzi. "Fu Guo": "We will be weak if we have promised to believe or not, and we will be weak if we do not celebrate." Yang Diao's note: "Gradually, advance." "Huainanzi. "Speaking Mountain": "The success or failure of a thing must be born from the niche, and the words will gradually change."

" Gradually " means worsening and serious. Such as "Shang Shu. "Gu Ming": "Wang said: Woohoo! The disease is getting worse, but only a few." Kong Chuan: "I sighed that his disease is going to be strong, but it is in danger." "Liezi. "Li Ming": "Ji Liang gets sick, and he is getting sick in ten days. His son cried around and he asked for a doctor." Zhang Zhan's note: "Gradually, drama."

" Gradually " means clues and signs. Such as "Lun Heng. "Ji Yao": "Fortune and evil gradually, if heaven tells it." "Hou Han Shu. "The Biography of Huan Rong Ding Hong": "If the government is responsible and Du Jian guards against cuteness, the evil demon will be eliminated and the good will be eliminated."

" Gradually " is also one of the sixty-four hexagrams. The shape of the hexagram is Genxia and Sunda. "Zhou Yi. "Gradually": "Gradually, women return to good luck. Lizhen." Wang Bi's note: "Gradually, the hexagram of gradual progress."

"Wen Yuan Biography": "Every time Kai Zhi eats sugarcane, he always goes from the end to the root. People or strangers. Cloud: "Gradually into a better state." Long, reading more and more things.”

humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「斬」聲。「漸」是古水名，即今浙江，又特指浙江中上游的新安江。《說文》：「漸，水，出丹陽黟南蠻中，東入海。从水，斬聲。」《水經．卷四十》：「漸江水出三天子都，北過餘杭，東入于海。」

　　「漸」表示慢慢流進。如《尚書．禹貢》：「東漸于海，西被于流沙。」又表示疏導。如《史記．越王句踐世家》：「禹之功大矣，漸九川，定九州，至于今諸夏艾安。」

　　「漸」表示沾濕。如《詩．衛風．氓》：「淇水湯湯，漸車帷裳。」《墨子．尚賢下》：「雨露之所漸，粒食之所養。」孫詒讓閒詁引《廣雅》：「漸，漬也。」

　　「漸」又指浸染。如《荀子．勸學》：「蘭槐之根是為芷，其漸之滫，君子不近，庶人不服。」「漸之滫」指浸染到泔水。《漢書．董仲舒傳》：「漸民以仁，摩民以誼，節民以禮，故其刑罰甚輕而禁不犯者，教化行而習俗美也。」顏師古注：「漸，謂浸潤之。」

　　「漸」表示逐步、漸進。如《荀子．富國》：「已諾不信則兵弱，慶賞不漸則兵弱。」楊倞注：「漸，進也。」《淮南子．說山》：「事之成敗，必由小生，言有漸也。」

　　「漸」表示加重、嚴重。如《尚書．顧命》：「王曰：嗚呼！疾大漸，惟幾。」孔傳：「自嘆其疾大進篤，惟危殆。」《列子．力命》：「季梁得疾，十日大漸。其子環而泣之，請醫。」張湛注：「漸，劇也。」

　　「漸」表示端倪、徵兆。如《論衡．紀妖》：「吉凶之漸，若天告之。」《後漢書．桓榮丁鴻列傳》：「若敕政責躬，杜漸防萌，則凶妖銷滅，害除福湊矣。」

　　「漸」也是六十四卦之一，卦形為艮下巽上。《周易．漸》：「漸，女歸吉。利貞。」王弼注：「漸者，漸進之卦也。」

　　「漸」可用作副詞，表示程度緩緩增加。如《晉書．文苑列傳》：「愷之每食甘蔗，恒自尾至本。人或怪之。云：『漸入佳境。』」唐代白居易〈與元九書〉：「自登朝來，年齒漸長，閱事漸多。」

漸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàn］
［《廣韻》慈染切，上琰，從。］
“渐1”的繁体字。
(1)古水名。即今浙江，亦指浙江中、上游的新安江。
(2)缓进；逐步。
(3)逐渐发展的过程。
(4)（疾病）严重；加剧。
(5)疏导。
(6)开端，起始。
(7)引申为端倪；迹象。
(8)条件；前提。
(9)次序。
(10)引申为依照次序。
(11)成长；滋长。
(12)逐渐。
(13)正，正当。
(14)旋即，不久。
(15)至，到。
(16)《易》卦名，艮下巽上。
(17)佛教语，指说法的浅深次第。亦谓主张信徒须历长期修行，始得心明累尽，达到涅槃境界。与“頓”相对。
(18)人体穴位名。
(19)用同“慚”。参见“漸恧”。
[②]［jiān］
［《廣韻》子廉切，平鹽，精。］
“渐2”的繁体字。“湛4”的被通假字。
(1)流入；入。
(2)淹没；浸泡。
(3)引申为殁，死亡。
(4)沾湿；溅湿。

You're stuck in your car during a tsunami and all you have to break out is an axe. You whack and whack but you're only gradually making progress. You thought an axe would be an easy way to get out of a car but it's not working like you'd planned! You have to make more than gradual progress if you don't want to drown.
Imagine gradually denting your car door open with an axe while you're trapped in a tsunami. This isn't fast enough!
